works.description:
"In my earlier days as a Blogger I’ve  
tried many free WordPress Themes. I didn’t want to buy a theme in the  
beginning, but now I realise how valuable premium themes are. I learnt this  
lesson the hard way, and in a sense the better way, through frustrating  
hours in which I was customizing free themes via CSS codes. Instead of  
focusing my time on writing and sharing information with my network, there  
I was going through this theme and that.

I hit upon a few good free themes which somewhat eased the frustration. One  
of such is the Pagelines Platform. The other Paglines theme that I played  
around with was the Whitehouse. I really like both of these themes, because  
of the stable coding that has been put into them, along with the ability to  
do basic customizing and ofcourse their great minimalist/semi-minimalist  
look. I am still talking about free themes here, and I’ve used these two  
themes on former blogs, and I was pretty satisfied.

The Pagelines Platform appealed to me more than any other, and this was  
because I was able to customize it without coding through a drag and drop  
system. I must confess that I did not vastly customize the theme, but it  
was way easier to do stuff with Platform such as changing the header, and  
increasing or decreasing the size of columns, or even changing what side I  
want my sidebar. I was able to get a taste of the premium theme, and that  
is what led me to buy the Platform Pro which I haven’t regretted. Now, all  
the features are accessible to me. I use the Platform Pro on this blog, and  
as you may see it is fairly customized. For example, the header is my  
design, the navigation bar is different than the default, and even the font  
is different that than that of the default. I have used a small amount of  
coding to do some of these things, but it’s nothing that you have to  
conjure up, because the team at Pagelines will help you to sort those  
customized code issues out. Just be a part of the community and post your  
question on the forum, and you will be assisted. I guarantee that even as a  
user. Actually, I haven’t posted any question of my own, because I looked  
around and found that my question was already answered.

So, I use the Platform Pro for my personal blog and even for business. You  
can vastly change the look of your website with it. Shutterwords and  
EduNatural are examples that I am working on. Keep in mind that for certain  
highly customized versions, you may need the assistance of a Developer, but  
if you are like me – a kind of Do-It-Yourselfer then by all means try  
Pagelines Platform Pro."
